    <p>I primarily work with <a href="https://www.lsu.edu/hss/psychology/faculty/cognitive/cox.php">Christopher Cox</a> and <a href="https://juschnei.wixsite.com/lendlab/dr-julie-m-schneider">Julie M. # Pictures

```{=html}
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>Click Through Pictures</title>
  <style>
    .image-container {
      text-align: center;
    }
    .image-container img {
      max-width: 100%;
      height: auto;
      display: none; /* Hide all images by default */
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <div class="image-container">
    <img src="images/bauhaus_brain1.png" alt="Bauhaus Brain" width=400px>
    <img src="images/jango.jpg" alt="Bauhaus Brain" width=400px>
    <img src="images/jinx.jpg" alt="Bauhaus Brain" width=400px>
    <img src="images/winston.jpg" alt="Bauhaus Brain" width=400px>
    <!-- Add more images as needed -->
  </div>
  <button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-dark mt-2" onclick="nextImage()">Next</button>

  <script>
    let currentImageIndex = 0;
    const images = document.querySelectorAll('.image-container img');

    function showImage(index) {
      if (index < 0) {
        index = images.length - 1;
      } else if (index >= images.length) {
        index = 0;
      }

      // Hide all images
      images.forEach(image => image.style.display = 'none');

      // Show the selected image
      images[index].style.display = 'block';
      currentImageIndex = index;
    }

    function nextImage() {
      showImage(currentImageIndex + 1);
    }

    // Show the first image initially
    showImage(0);
  </script>
</body>
</html>
```
